targets.query: SELECT mean("status") FROM "services_stats" WHERE ("host" =~ /.*/ AND "service" = 'sshd.service' OR "service" = 'ssh.service') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT 8 * derivative(mean("bytes_recv"),1s) FROM "net" WHERE "host" = 'JumpHost' AND "interface" = 'eth0' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT derivative(mean("bytes_sent"), 1s) *8 FROM "net" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "interface" = 'ens192') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)
